price: Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé ìpadà sí ilé ayé wà fún wa ni, nígbà náà àwa ìbá wà nínú àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.”
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
